Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: Art of the Seventeenth and Eighteenth Centuries in Naples
Provenance: Giovanni Battista Ricciardi, Florence and palazzo Strozzavolpe, near Poggibonsi (until d. 1686; inv. April 22, 1687, folio 180, "un quadro grande . . . dipintovi un filosofo che scrive sopra una testa di morto")
by descent to Niccolò Ricciardi Serguido, palazzo Strozzavolpe (by 1767)
James Thomson, New York (bought in Florence; about 1836–48; sale, Dumont, New York, March 22, 1848, to Livingston)
his daughter, Mary Livingston Harrison, New York (1873–d. 1921)
